attributes.action: Include all Supermarkets workers into  priority list to get the Covid-19 Vaccine
attributes.additional_details: We are the biggest forgotten key workers since this pandemic time has arrived. In difference with other key workers (but not taking away any importance from them) we've always been there since day 0 and will continue there until the end of this and beyond. Reviewing this we are very potential spreaders, think this, each colleague in a supermarket may deal with between 200-300 persons per day, facemask and social distancing isn't enough to keep us safe and working.
attributes.background: What I want it and definitely  the most of my colleagues wants is to get the Covid-19 vaccine in the same priority as NHS workers.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567426
